params.id: the token id to withdraw or 0 for the base token (ether)
params.token: the erc20 token to withdraw or 0 for the base token (ether)

TokenWithdrawn(address,address,uint256,u.notice: emitted when a withdrawal is made

withdraw(address,address,uint256,uint256.notice: withdraw some amount of either a token or ether out of contract to caller
